title.narrative: Netherlands Ministry of Foreign Affairs for Ground Truth Solutions Core support 2020-2022

description.narrative: Core support for our mission to challenge and enable actors in the humanitarian space to listen systematically to people affected by crisis and to use their feedback Additionally, core support to enhance our efforts to improve the effectiveness, efficiency and accountability of the humanitarian system
Core support to enable Ground Truth Solutions for its mission and activities
